title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד -31 בינואר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Software Engineer-Java, Developer Front-End Senior,Java Developer
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Software Engineer-Java, Developer Front-End Senior,Java Developer

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
Design, build, and deploy server-side software in Scala, Akka, MongoDB, Elasticsearch and more.
Work with fellow engineers and business stakeholders to understand requirements.
Requirements:
Able to learn new technologies quickly and effectively
Solid experience building scalable, distributed systems
Solid Relational or non-Relational (NoSQL) databases
Flexibility to re-learn the way you may have always done things — we move quickly and so should you!
Nice-to-haves:
Experience programming for the JVM
Knowledge in Amazon AWS/EC2
Familiar with Unix/Linux (POSIX commands, shell scripting, processes, etc.)
Veteran of your own open-source project
Have worked in an Agile environment
To send a CV for the position of Server Guru – Meerkat
 
Join the ForeScout R&D organization’s team of Software Engineers and take part in defining and driving the future world-wide market leading product suite consists of: Network Access Control, Endpoint Compliance, Mobile Control, and Intrusion Prevention. Applications range from Client / Server applications to Web apps for a Network Access Control solution, running on both Windows and Linux systems.
Responsibilities:
Research and design product features and components.
Create design documents.
Implement both new features and modifications to existing code, from coding phase through product release.
Full Stack development
Requirements:
Minimum 2 years development experience
Experience in Pure Java programming
Experience with Object Oriented Design
TCP/IP and basic Network understanding – advantage
Experience with Unix/Linux scripting – advantage
Experience developing large scale applications
Dependency injection- advantage
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent.
To send a CV for the position of Software Engineer-Java – ForeScout
Perion Codefuel’s new Monetization group is looking for a software team leader to lead its new, fast growing team.
Requirements:
At least 3 years of experience in server development, including hands-on technical management
Proven experience in the design and implementation of high-performance data systems and working with databases (Relational and NoSQL)
Proven experience in distributed data storage, networking and cloud technologies
More than 5 years practical OOP/OOD experience in C++, Java, .Net
Experience in Node.JS and client-side technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular
Experience in cloud services: Amazon, Azure
Experience working in the ad-tech industry – advantage
Experience in managing 2-4 members team – advantage
Excellent written and verbal communication skills (Hebrew & English)
Proven ability to accomplish critical business objectives
Relevant academic degree in Engineering/Computer Science or equivalent
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Team Leader – Perion
צוות Front End קטן מחפש מפתח גדול.
לפיתוח צד ה-client של מוצר צעיר ב-HPE Software – ולא, לא מדובר על פיתוח תוכנה למדפסות… אנחנו מפתחים כלי לבדיקת אפליקציות מובייל, שמאפשר להריץ טסטים ידניים ואוטומטיים על אפליקציות ומכשירים פיזיים שנמצאים ליד הטסטר, במעבדה או בענן.
אנחנו מחפשים מפתח או מפתחת שיהיו “ראש לשועלים”: המינימום הוא כמובן היכולת לקחת פיצ’ר מרעיון דרך design,UX, ועד פיתוח, אבל מה שאנחנו באמת רוצים זה נסיון טכנולוגי נרחב (כן… גם נסיון ב- Angular) ולמידה עצמאית – שיתורגמו להובלה טכנית של כל חברי הצוות. השועלים הנ”ל הם מפתחים ומפתחות שכיף לפתוח איתם את הבוקר על קפה ולפתח איתם בכל היום.
למה כדאי לי להגיש מועמדות דווקא למשרה הזו?
אתגר טכנולוגי – יש
אנשים שכייף לעבוד איתם – יש
סקר BDI הכניס אותנו בעשרייה הפותחת של חברות ההיטק שהכי שווה לעבוד בהם – יש
אז למה אתם מחכים?
דרישות: 
B.Sc in computer science / software engineering
Excellent knowledge of HTML5, Javascript, CSS3 (SASS an advantage).
Expariance with Angular- Must.
Complex UI components development experience – major advantage
Mobile technologies development experience – advantage.
Ability to quickly ramp up on new technologies.
Strong team player
To send a CV for the position of Developer Front-End Senior – HPE
*Develops database solutions by designing proposed system; defining database physical structure and functional capabilities, security, back-up, and recovery specifications.
*Maintains database performance by identifying and resolving production and application development problems; calculating optimum values for parameters; evaluating, integrating, and installing new releases; completing maintenance; answering user questions.
*Review and make recommendations on existing platforms for continuous improvement.
*Data bases platform leading
Requirements:
*At least 5 years’ experience in DBA team management (MS SQL technologies)
*Knowledge in HP Vertica
*Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies
*Experience working in an Agile development environment
Advantages:
*Expertise in NoSQL technologies
*Expertise in performance optimization
*Knowledge and/or experience in Hadoop and big data echo system technologies
To send a CV for the position of Data Base Team Leader – OptimalPlus
We’re looking for a Server-side developer to join our growing Startup in Herzliya.This is an excellent opportunity to be part of an exciting venture, in a dynamic, fast growing environment where you can truly have an impact on the product.
Requirements:
5+ years in C# development
Develop and maintain server-side components for our main products.
Develop integration with 3rd party systems
Produce high quality code with unit & integration tests
1+ years in unit and integration testing development
Excellent spoken and written English.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Independent, motivated and self-managed at work
Attention to details and punctuality.
Team player with good interpersonal skills.
Advantages:
Experience in WCF services development
Experience in ASP.NET MVC development
Experience with Data Security
To send a CV for the position of C# Developer – Server Side – safe-t
Based in central Tel Aviv, our R&D operates in a dynamic environment, where every developer can impact the flow of technology – from introducing the smallest libraries to making big infrastructure changes. We welcome open-minded developers, share knowledge and help each other to push Optimove forward to the cutting edge of today’s tech! We are looking for talented Ninjas to join the team – strong and energetic A-players interested in developing cutting-edge technology to make an impact on our company and on the entire marketing industry
Responsibilities:
Design and implement complex algorithms for the Optimove application and underlying infrastructure
Improvement, and performance optimization, of existing components
solve various product challenges with creative solutions.
Requirements:

At least 3 years of experience in C# development
At least 3 years of experience in client-side development (JavaScript, CSS and HTML
Excellent OOD, C# and .NET skills
Perfect understanding of client-server architecture
Good knowledge of SQL
Well acquainted with Microsoft IDE and tools (VS, SSMS, TFS, etc )
Motivation to think, invent, learn and a passion to code
Advantages:
BSc in computer science or elite army intelligence unit graduate
Experience with AngularJS/JQuery/Bootstrap
Experience with MVC and RESTful Web API
Experience with NodeJS/MongoDB/Redis
Understanding of scaling concepts and cloud infrastructure
To send a CV for the position of Senior Developer – Optimove
As a Java engineer you will design and create the next-generation high-performing, low latency, scalable real time bidding platform. Our platform is handling more than 120K bids per second and growing every month. Our ambition is to connect to every mobile application and offer our clients the ability to buy traffic on it. As a java engineer, you will work to scale the system, create algorithms to filter the data while maintaining current throughput and latency
Responsibilities:
Design and create a high-volume, low-latency real time bidding platform
Create the backend for the campaign management system that will be used by our clients
Write well designed, testable, efficient code
Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications
Supervise the production environment to make sure it is performing well
Investigating technologies and architectural changes to improve performance
Requirements:
Minimum Qualifications:
BS in Computer Science
Deep understanding of java and the JVM
Experience with high throughput multithreading programming
Experience in unit testing
Preferred Qualifications:
Master’s in Computer Science or related technical field
Experience in creating large scalable systems
Experience working with Amazon EC2
Experience with open source java libraries
Experience with thrift
To send a CV for the position of Java Developer – Ubimo

Pre-sales and operations.
You’ll make sure potential custmers become real customers.
In addition, make sure that all the organization’s trains are running on time and perfectly which includes installations, presentations and lots more.
Requirements:
enthusiasm
curiosity
Willingness to work
Desire to work hard and have fun
 To send a CV for the position of Pre-sales and operations manager – Practi
 
SysAid is looking for a software support hot shot to join the elite ranks of our support troops. As support hotshot you will be positioned in the front lines and serve as the beautiful face of the company.
 Naturally, you’ll get to speak with many customers from all over the world, so you better sharpen up your tongue and start practicing your fingers for quick typing, be ready to join a team of winners.
Requirements:
1 year of  experience as software engineer support representative
1 year of experience providing post-sales phone and email support to customers
Knowledge of DNS, TCP/IP and other networking concepts
Understanding of relational databases
Familiarity with Windows and Linux operation systems
Fluent English – verbal and written
Ability to work in shifts, including weekends
Bonus Skills:
Familiarity with ITSM tools
ITIL certification
Familiarity with application servers
Familiarity with LDAP configuration
Soft skills:
Team player with excellent interpersonal skills
Quick learner with desire to learn new tools and techniques
Strong work ethic with the willingness to do what it takes to get the job done
Proactive with a positive attitude
 To send a CV for the position of Software Support Hotshot – SysAid
